title: Arabic 22
text: Noble have I created thee, yet thou hast abased thyself. Rise then unto that for which thou wast created.

prev.title: Arabic 21
prev.text: Upon the tree of effulgent glory I have hung for thee the choicest fruits, wherefore hast thou turned away and contented thyself with that which is less good? Return then unto that which is better for thee in the realm on high.
prev.teaser: Upon the tree of effulgent glory...

next.title: Arabic 23
next.text: To the eternal I call thee, yet thou dost seek that which perisheth. What hath made thee turn away from Our desire and seek thine own?
